the hospital admissions desk. 
You will be taken to the labour 
ward or your room, where you 
can change into a hospital 
gown or a nightdress of your 
own. Choose one that is loose 
and preferably made of cotton, 
because you will feel hot 
during labour and will not want 
something tight.
Examination by the midwife
The midwife will ask you about 
what has been happening so

become more homelike in
